subject: Ironman US Championship
Bicycles and Bicycling
Running
Swimming
Triathlon
lead_paragraph: The competition, which involves a 2.4-mile swim, a 112-mile bike race and a 26.2-mile run, includes people who have survived life-threatening injuries or illnesses.
snippet: The competition, which involves a 2.4-mile swim, a 112-mile bike race and a 26.2-mile run, includes people who have survived life-threatening injuries or illnesses.
